long_description: boyle & fogarty construction is a utility contractor specializing in water, sewer, and drainage solutions. founded in 1978 by rusty boyle and john fogarty, our company has been in business for over 40 years, completing numerous large projects and establishing a strong reputation in the state of rhode island.
business_tags: utility contractor | water & sewer | trenching & excavating | osha standards
generated_description: boyle & fogarty, legally known as boyle & fogarty construction co inc, based in smithfield, rhode island, is a utility contractor specializing in water, sewer, and drainage construction. founded in 1978 by rusty boyle and john fogarty, the company has completed numerous large projects and established a strong reputation in the state. boyle & fogarty construction emphasizes safety, adhering to all occupational safety and health administration (osha) standards, and has participated in the national utility contractors association's (nuca) "trench stand down" initiative since 2019. the company's foremen conduct regular job box talks to ensure employees are aware of hazards and practice safe work habits.
generated_business_tags: sewer and drainage systems construction | excavation safety | utility contractor | construction services
